channel.title: Posts on Liam Lin's BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Liam Lin's BLOG

item.title: 香港几家好吃的店
item.description: 来到香港第一件事情当然就是吃了。我从米其林指南香港澳门2018版上面的街头小吃推荐中，挑了几家来吃。遗憾的是，毕竟时间精力有限，不能全部吃完

item.title: 关于在香港的告别
item.description: “你好？请问是这里退学生卡的押金吗？” “是的。” 我把我的卡递了过去。她很利索，让签了两个名字之后，便把一张390元的支票给我了。到了银行，同

item.title: 游麦理浩径第一二段
item.description: ​ 麦理浩径被誉为亚洲十大徒步路线之一，我一直不以为然，直到今天。 ​ 从上窑出发，踏上麦理浩径的第一段，很快便走到了万宜水库的西坝。两边是蓝色的

item.title: System Security Revision —— Cryptography
item.description: Content What is Cryptography? Flow Classical Ciphers What is Cryptography? In ancient Greek, kryptós means hidden or secret and, of course, graphy means to write. Generally, we consider cryptography as a practical study for secure communication, that is for preventing the third parties or the public from reading the private messages[1]. Flow 1 2 plaintext--(key)-->encryption-->ciphertext-->(Communication)-- -->ciphertext--(key)-->decryption-->plaintext CLassical Ciphers [1] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cryptography--- title: “System Security Revision —— Cryptography” author: Liam Lin date: 2018-12-12T01:40:21+08:00 categories: - courses tags:
